name: Value Added in Machinery - Belgium
description: Value Added in Machinery - Belgium. Source: UNIDO, which specializes in and promotes industrial development for reduction of poverty, inclusive globalization and sustainability of the environmental. For more information, please see http://www.unido.org/
column_names: General purpose machinery (Value added at factor values/Euros)

Bearings; gears; gearing & driving elements (Value added at factor values/Euros)
